name: Stealth Warrior (BendySonic)
description:
Ancient Japan is a paradise! Can you save it? Show off you ninja skills in this platformer!

====================================

Control:

MOVEWASDDASHdouble click in right or leftPAUSEeescATTACKuse mouse

===================================

Tutorial: You are locked in a dungeon, use your ninja skills to get out and defeat the boss. Use double tap for shower, collect coins, open doors, climb walls, upgrade you character in my shop!

===========================

Game Developer: mrbuzzy(BendySonic)

Game was made in 6-7 days, Thanks for playing, It's my first game!

Music: Main - Caught in a Loop, FNAF: security breach, Boss - Mission Impossible
